## Block.getSourceData() method

Get data from datasource

**Signature:**

```typescript
getSourceData(header?: boolean, all?: boolean): Promise<any[][]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  header | boolean | _(Optional)_ : include column names |
|  all | boolean | _(Optional)_ : fetch all data from datasource |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;any\[\]\[\]&gt;

A promise that resolves to a two-dimensional array representing the data.
